name: Way of Mercy
description: Monks of the Way of Mercy manipulate life energy to heal the suffering or bring swift ends.

3.name: Implements of Mercy
3.description: Gain proficiency in Insight, Medicine, and the herbalism kit, and don a special mask reflecting your role.

3.name: Hand of Healing
3.description: As an action, spend 1 ki point to heal a creature you touch for your Martial Arts die + Wisdom modifier. One Flurry of Blows attack can be replaced with this without spending ki.

3.name: Hand of Harm
3.description: When you hit with an unarmed strike, spend 1 ki point to deal extra necrotic damage equal to your Martial Arts die + Wisdom modifier once per turn.

6.name: Physician's Touch
6.description: Hand of Healing can also cure disease or end certain conditions; Hand of Harm can also poison the target until the end of your next turn.

11.name: Flurry of Healing and Harm
11.description: When you use Flurry of Blows, you can replace each strike with Hand of Healing without spending ki, and you can use Hand of Harm once without ki.

17.name: Hand of Ultimate Mercy
17.description: As an action, spend 5 ki points to revive a creature that died within the last 24 hours, restoring hit points and removing certain conditions.
